newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to list options on BEA Systems July 29.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to list options on BEA Systems July 29.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange said Tuesday it will list options on BEA Systems Inc from July 29.

The options will trade on the March cycle, with introductory expiries in August, September, December and March. Initial strike prices are set at 15, 17-1/2 and 20. BEA Systems options will trade in the General Motors crowd.

BEA Systems, located in Sunnyvale, Calif., designs, develops, markets and supports software used by large organizations for business processes. ((Derivatives Desk (312) 408-8750)) E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
